Package PegSolitaireGame

Class PegSolitaireEngine

java.lang.Object
PegSolitaireGame.PegSolitaireEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
PegSolitaire
public class PegSolitaireEngine extends Object implements PegSolitaire
The class that makes the engine of the PegSolitaire game. It handles all the functions that directly affect the board.
See Also:
  • PegSolitaire
  • PegSolitaireExc
  • PegSolitaireGUI
